sqlMap.statement:
SELECT A.CMT ,A.ROW_NUMBER ,A.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,A.DS_ASSET_STGNG_PK ,A.FROM_SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,A.SERVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,A.PROC_MODE_CD ,A.MDSE_CD ,A.SER_NUM ,A.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,A.BASE_CMPT_FLG ,A.ASSET_TP_CD ,A.SHPG_PLN_NUM ,A.INVTY_TRX_PK ,A.CPO_ORD_NUM ,A.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM ,A.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM ,A.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM ,A.SHIP_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD ,A.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD ,A.SELL_TO_CUST_CD ,A.SOLD_TO_CUST_LOC_CD ,A.INV_NUM ,A.INV_DT ,A.RTN_WH_CD ,A.SLS_REP_TOC_CD ,A.STD_COST_AMT ,A.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,A.EZINTIME ,A.DS_ASSET_STGNG_STS_CD ,A.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK FROM ( SELECT STG.PROC_MODE_CD || STG.TO_SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK AS CMT ,ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by STG.PROC_MODE_CD || STG.MDSE_CD || STG.TO_SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK||STG.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM || STG.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM ORDER BY STG.BASE_CMPT_FLG DESC) AS ROW_NUMBER ,STG.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,STG.DS_ASSET_STGNG_PK ,STG.FROM_SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK AS FROM_SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,STG.TO_SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK AS SERVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,STG.PROC_MODE_CD ,STG.MDSE_CD ,STG.SER_NUM ,STG.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,STG.BASE_CMPT_FLG ,STG.ASSET_TP_CD ,STG.SHPG_PLN_NUM ,STG.INVTY_TRX_PK ,STG.CPO_ORD_NUM ,STG.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM ,STG.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM ,STG.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM ,STG.SHIP_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD ,STG.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD ,STG.SELL_TO_CUST_CD ,STG.SOLD_TO_CUST_LOC_CD ,STG.AP_VND_INV_NUM AS INV_NUM ,STG.INV_DT ,STG.RTN_WH_CD ,STG.SLS_REP_TOC_CD ,STG.STD_COST_AMT ,DSCNG.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,STG.EZINTIME ,STG.DS_ASSET_STGNG_STS_CD ,STG.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK
FROM DS_ASSET_STGNG STG ,CPO_DTL DTL ,DS_CPO_CONFIG DSCNG
WHERE STG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
#dsAssetStgngStsCd[]#
AND STG.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND STG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND STG.CPO_ORD_NUM = DTL.CPO_ORD_NUM (+) AND STG.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM = DTL.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM (+) AND STG.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM = DTL.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM (+) AND DTL.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0' AND DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DSCNG.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND DTL.CPO_ORD_NUM = DSCNG.CPO_ORD_NUM (+) AND DTL.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM = DSCNG.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM (+) AND DSCNG.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0' AND DSCNG.CONFIG_CATG_CD (+) = #configCatgCdIsOutbound# ORDER BY STG.PROC_MODE_CD ,STG.TO_SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK NULLS FIRST ,DTL.BASE_CMPT_FLG DESC ,STG.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM ,STG.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #limitCount#

SELECT SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,SMM.MDSE_CD ,SMM.SER_NUM
FROM SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM WHERE SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SMM.SO_NUM = #soNum# AND SMM.SO_SLP_NUM = #soSlpNum# AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT NVL(OPD.FUNC_CSMP_CR_AMT, 0) AS FUNC_CSMP_CR_AMT FROM CPO_DTL CD ,ORD_PRFT_DTL OPD WHERE CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CD.CPO_ORD_NUM = #cpoOrdNum# AND CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM = #cpoDtlLineNum# AND CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM = #cpoDtlLineSubNum# AND CD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND OPD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND OPD.TRX_HDR_NUM = CD.CPO_ORD_NUM AND OPD.TRX_LINE_NUM = CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM AND OPD.TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM = CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM AND OPD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY OPD.ORD_PRFT_VRSN_NUM DESC

SELECT
NVL(-(SUM(CD.CPO_DTL_FUNC_NET_AMT)), 0) AS CPO_DTL_FUNC_NET_AMT
FROM CPO_DTL CD ,MDSE M WHERE CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CD.CPO_ORD_NUM = #cpoOrdNum# AND CD.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM = #dsOrdPosnNum# AND CD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = M.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CD.MDSE_CD = M.MDSE_CD
#coaMdseTpCd[]#
AND M.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,MST.ASSET_POST_FLG ,MST.MDSE_CD ,MST.ACTV_ASSET_FLG FROM DS_ASSET_MSTR MST WHERE MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MST.PRNT_DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK = #prntDsAssetMstrPk# AND MST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,MST.PRNT_DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.ASSET_STS_CD ,MST.BASE_CMPT_FLG
FROM DS_ASSET_MSTR MST WHERE MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = #svcMachMstrPk# AND MST.ASSET_POST_FLG = #assetPostFlg# AND MST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.ASSET_STS_CD ,MST.PRNT_DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.BASE_CMPT_FLG ,MST.ASSET_POST_FLG ,MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,MST.MDSE_CD ,MST.ASSET_TP_CD
FROM DS_ASSET_MSTR MST WHERE MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = #svcMachMstrPk#
AND MST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK = #dsAssetMstrPk#
AND MST.PRNT_DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK = #prntDsAssetMstrPk#
#assetStsCd[]#
AND MST.ASSET_POST_FLG = #assetPostFlg#

SELECT MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.ASSET_STS_CD ,MST.PRNT_DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,MST.BASE_CMPT_FLG ,MST.ASSET_POST_FLG ,MST.ACTV_ASSET_FLG
FROM DS_ASSET_MSTR MST
WHERE MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = #svcMachMstrPk# AND MST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.ASSET_STS_CD ,MST.ASSET_POST_FLG ,MST.PRNT_DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,MST.MDSE_CD ,MST.BASE_CMPT_FLG ,MST.ACTV_ASSET_FLG FROM DS_ASSET_MSTR MST WHERE MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK = #prntDsAssetMstrPk#
AND MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = #svcMachMstrPk#
AND MST.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = #svcConfigMstrPk#
#assetStsCd[]#
AND MST.BASE_CMPT_FLG = #baseCmptflg#
AND MST.ASSET_POST_FLG = #assetPostFlg#
AND MST.ACTV_ASSET_FLG = #actvAssetFlg#
AND MST.MAN_ENTRY_FLG = #manEntryFlg#
AND MST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,MST.MDSE_CD ,MST.ASSET_POST_FLG ,MST.ACTV_ASSET_FLG
FROM DS_ASSET_MSTR MST WHERE MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND MST.PRNT_DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK = #dsAssetMstrPk# AND MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK <> #dsAssetMstrPk#

SELECT 1 FROM DS_ASSET_STGNG DAS_R WHERE DAS_R.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DAS_R.DS_ASSET_STGNG_PK = #dsAssetStgngPk# AND DAS_R.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM DS_ASSET_STGNG DAS_S ,CPO C ,CPO_DTL CD WHERE DAS_S.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DAS_R.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DAS_S.CPO_ORD_NUM = DAS_R.CPO_ORD_NUM AND DAS_S.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM = DAS_R.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM AND DAS_S.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM = DAS_R.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM AND DAS_S.PROC_MODE_CD = #procModeCdIsSvcExch# AND DAS_S.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DAS_S.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DAS_S.CPO_ORD_NUM = C.CPO_ORD_NUM AND C.DS_ORD_CATG_CD = #dsOrdCatgCdIsSvcExch# AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DAS_S.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DAS_S.CPO_ORD_NUM = CD.CPO_ORD_NUM AND DAS_S.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM = CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM AND DAS_S.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM = CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM AND DAS_S.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM = CD.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM AND CD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CPO C ,DS_CPO_RTRN_DTL DCRD WHERE DAS_R.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DAS_R.CPO_ORD_NUM = C.CPO_ORD_NUM AND DAS_R.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND C.DS_ORD_CATG_CD <> #dsOrdCatgCdIsSvcExch# AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DAS_R.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DCRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DAS_R.CPO_ORD_NUM = DCRD.CPO_ORD_NUM AND DAS_R.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM = DCRD.DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_NUM AND DAS_R.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM = DCRD.DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_SUB_NUM AND DAS_R.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM = DCRD.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM AND DCRD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) )

SELECT '1' FROM DS_ASSET_STGNG DAS ,DS_CPO_RTRN_DTL CRD ,DS_CPO_RTRN_DTL CRDP WHERE DAS.DS_ASSET_STGNG_PK = #dsAssetStgngPk# AND CRD.CPO_ORD_NUM = DAS.CPO_ORD_NUM AND CRD.DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_NUM = DAS.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM AND CRD.DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_SUB_NUM = DAS.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM AND CRD.CPO_ORD_NUM = CRDP.CPO_ORD_NUM AND CRD.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM = CRDP.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM AND CRDP.BASE_CMPT_FLG = #baseCmptFlg#

SELECT MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.ASSET_STS_CD ,MST.PRNT_DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK FROM DS_ASSET_MSTR MST ,SVC_CONFIG_MSTR SCM WHERE MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = SCM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AND SCM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = #svcConfigMstrPk# AND MST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SCM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT MST.PRNT_DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,MST.MDSE_CD ,MST.ASSET_TP_CD FROM DS_ASSET_MSTR MST ,SVC_CONFIG_MSTR SCM WHERE MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MST.ASSET_POST_FLG = #assetPostFlg# AND MST.ACTV_ASSET_FLG = #actvAssetFlg# AND MST.MAN_ENTRY_FLG = #manEntryFlg# AND MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = SCM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AND SCM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = #svcConfigMstrPk# AND MST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SCM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK FROM DS_ASSET_MSTR MST WHERE MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = #svcMachMstrPk# AND MST.ACTV_ASSET_FLG = #actvAssetFlg# AND MST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.ASSET_POST_FLG ,MST.ACTV_ASSET_FLG FROM DS_ASSET_MSTR MST WHERE MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MST.PRNT_DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK = #prntDsAssetMstrPk# AND MST.PRNT_DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK <> MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK AND MST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT MST.PRNT_DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,MST.MDSE_CD ,MST.ASSET_POST_FLG FROM DS_ASSET_MSTR MST ,SVC_CONFIG_MSTR SCM WHERE MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = SCM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AND SCM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = #svcConfigMstrPk# AND MST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SCM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,MST.MDSE_CD FROM DS_ASSET_MSTR MST ,SVC_CONFIG_MSTR SCM WHERE MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MST.ASSET_POST_FLG = #assetPostFlg# AND MST.ACTV_ASSET_FLG = #actvAssetFlg# AND MST.MAN_ENTRY_FLG = #manEntryFlg# AND MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = SCM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AND SCM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = #svcConfigMstrPk# AND MST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SCM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,MST.MDSE_CD FROM DS_ASSET_MSTR MST ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM WHERE MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MST.ASSET_POST_FLG = #assetPostFlg# AND MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AND SMM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = #svcConfigMstrPk# AND MST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT MST.DS_ASSET_MSTR_PK ,MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,MST.MDSE_CD FROM DS_ASSET_MSTR MST ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM WHERE MST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MST.ASSET_POST_FLG = #assetPostFlg# AND MST.ACTV_ASSET_FLG = #actvAssetFlg# AND MST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AND SMM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = #svcConfigMstrPk# AND MST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
